name: Line - Android
description:
Line - Android  is engaging arcade game for Android. 

It has three game mode with growing difficult :  Classic Mode, Time Mode and Opposite Mode. In the main menu, you can find " How to play " section, with all information about game mode. The game controls are simples : all you have to do is to clic on the button sited on the bottom of the screen. Every game mode has a different background music . Your best score are always visible on the start page.

What you do? DOWNLOAD LINE - ANDROID, HURRY UP!
